hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors ###php 21.php jenkins #XML from partner explodes atm. Fixed version is used here. # run ONCE only, since source is static XML. # connector also now was migrated to PHP 8.2 # generates 21.tar.gz
# === Step 1of3 php environments_2_eol.php _ '{"task": "generate_eol_tags_pensoft", "resource":"AmphibiaWeb text", "resource_id":"21", "subjects":"Distribution"}' # source is 21.tar.gz # generates 21_ENV.tar.gz
#exit 0
### NOTE: marine+terrestrial habitat filter didn't change the DwCA ### Also from Jen: it looks like we can discard this filter from both AntWeb and AmphibiaWeb. DATA-1870
# === Step 2of3 OK: remove all MoF records with habitat value(s) that are descendants of both marine and terrestrial OK php rem_marine_terr_desc.php _ '{"resource_id":"21_ENV"}' #source: 21_ENV.tar.gz #generates: 21_ENV_01.tar.gz
# Step 3of3 OK: Clade Specific Filters for Habitat php clade_filters_4_habitats.php jenkins '{"resource_id":"21_ENV_01"}' #OK | result taxon.tab will be only those with occurrences. # source is 21_ENV_01.tar.gz # generates 21_ENV_02.tar.gz | TreatmentBank_adjustment_02
# Step 4 php remove_taxa_without_MoF.php _ '{"resource_id": "21_ENV_02"}' # generates 21_ENV_03.tar.gz
exit 0
# === STEP 4: LAST STEP: cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp 21_ENV_02.tar.gz 21_ENV_final.tar.gz ls -lt 21_ENV_02.tar.gz ls -lt 21_ENV_final.tar.gz # then delete 21_ENV_02.tar.gz rm -f 21_ENV_02.tar.gz
